name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rex - RegEx Highlight or Collapse Text

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use regular expressions to highlight or collapse text. Useful for logs or stacktraces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows to use regular expressions to highlight or collapse text on a web page. It was developed to facilitate log analysis (e.g. highlight important parts of stacktraces and collapsing framework noise)

GitHub: https://github.com/cgrossde/rex
